name: Ben
description: Senior trader with 7 years experience handling high-stakes live events. Manages live odds, monitors 6 screens simultaneously, and responds to market shifts in seconds. Reports to Trading Manager (Alex).

empathy_map.think_and_feel: Constant adrenaline during live events. Pride in reading markets fast. Frustration when feeds are slow or unreliable. Anxiety during Champions League finals.
empathy_map.hear: Alex (manager): 'Watch the margins on that match' | Junior traders: 'Is this odds right?' | Customers (via support): 'Why did you void my bet?' | Competitors: 'Our latency is under 500ms'
empathy_map.see: 6 screens with live odds, feeds, risk exposure. Competitors' odds changing in real-time. Chat floods with questions during goals. Red alerts when feeds lag.
empathy_map.say_and_do: Monitor feeds 24/7 during live events. Adjust odds in milliseconds. Escalate feed issues immediately. Train junior traders. Fight for better tools.
empathy_map.pain: Latency kills competitive edge. Feed errors force manual fixes. Slow data means lost bets to competitors. Manual reconciliation after events wastes hours.
empathy_map.gain: Sub-500ms latency lets me compete. Clean feeds mean less stress. Automated tools let me focus on strategy. Good margins protect my bonus.

previous_roles.title: Junior Trader
key_achievements: Promoted to Senior after handling Premier League solo during senior trader's absence
Reduced odds errors by 40% through better monitoring processes
Trained 6 junior traders (3 still on team)

defining_experiences.event: Champions League Final 2022 - Feed Lag During Penalty Shootout
defining_experiences.impact: 20-second feed lag during penalties. Couldn't suspend betting. Lost $35K to arbitrage players.
defining_experiences.lesson: Latency isn't just 'nice to have'—it's survival. 20 seconds might as well be 20 minutes in live trading.
defining_experiences.how_it_shapes_me: I'm obsessed with latency. I check ping times constantly. I don't trust 'fast enough'—I need milliseconds.

defining_experiences.impact: Managed odds for 12 matches in 4 hours. Completely burned out. Made 3 errors.
defining_experiences.lesson: Tools matter. Without automation, I'm the bottleneck. Can't scale human attention.
defining_experiences.how_it_shapes_me: I push Alex hard for better tools. I know what it's like to drown in screens.

defining_experiences.impact: Feed showed wrong score for 3 minutes. I caught it, suspended betting, saved $15K.
defining_experiences.lesson: Always verify. Never trust feeds 100%. Traders are the last line of defense.
defining_experiences.how_it_shapes_me: I'm skeptical of 'perfect' data claims. I check everything twice.

typical_phrases: I've seen situations where 500ms of latency costs us thousands
During Champions League finals, every millisecond counts
I remember when we had that feed error during...

market_trends.impact: Customers expect instant odds updates. Slow = lost bets.
market_trends.how_i_track: I check competitors' odds during live events. I time their updates.

market_trends.data: Bots now detect odds discrepancies in <100ms
market_trends.impact: If I'm slow, arb players hammer me. Lost $35K in 2022 due to lag.
market_trends.how_i_track: I see suspicious bet patterns. Support flags 'winner accounts.'

market_trends.impact: Harder to trade. Need specialized knowledge (I don't have it yet).
market_trends.how_i_track: Junior traders handle esports. I watch and learn.

main_competitors.name: Bet365
main_competitors.strength: Fastest odds updates (sub-300ms), best in-play coverage
main_competitors.how_they_pressure_me: Customers compare us to Bet365. 'Why are your odds slower?'
main_competitors.what_i_think: They're the gold standard. If I can't match their speed, I'm losing.

main_competitors.name: Pinnacle
main_competitors.strength: Sharp lines, fast updates, high limits
main_competitors.how_they_pressure_me: Arb players use Pinnacle as reference. If I'm off, they crush me.
main_competitors.what_i_think: I respect their trader quality. They're pros.

competitive_landscape.our_position: Mid-tier speed, decent coverage, but not elite. I feel it every day.
competitive_landscape.our_challenge: Need better tools to compete with Bet365's speed. Can't out-human them—need automation.
competitive_landscape.how_this_shapes_responses: I reference competitors when talking about latency. 'Bet365 does it in 300ms.'

provider_experience.betradar: Comprehensive coverage, but feed can lag during high load. API is clunky.
provider_experience.lsports: Cleaner API, faster feed, but sometimes misses niche markets.
provider_experience.betgenius: Good for esports, but I don't trade esports much yet.

what_i_dont_care_about: Strategic roadmaps (I care about today, not next year)
